title.name: Title
title.description: The title or name of the resource
title.example: Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) 1 Arc-Second Global

description.name: Abstract/Description
description.description: Abstract of resource if itâ€™s a document, otherwise a description of the resource
description.example: This paper introduces a new terrain model named HAND, and reports on the calibration and validation of landscape classes representing soil environments in Amazonia, which were derived using it. The HAND model normalizes topography according to the local relative heights found along ....

version.name: Version information
version.description: Information regarding the version of the resource

value.name: Version
value.description: The version number of the resource

notes.name: Version notes
notes.description: Notes on what is different in this version (release notes)
notes.example: * Introduction rewritten to match contents\n* Appendix A added\n

creator.name: Creator information
creator.description: Information about the creator(s) of the resource

name.name: Author name
name.description: The name of the author/creator of the resource

affiliationURL.name: AffiliationURL
affiliationURL.description: The URL of the organization in 'affiliation'.

organization.name: Creating organization
organization.description: The organization that produced the resource (in case individual persons are unknown)

identifier.name: Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier for the person or organization that created the resource

publisher.name: Publisher information
publisher.description: Information about the publisher of the resource

identifierType.name: Type of identifier
identifierType.description: The type of identifier used under 'identifier'

publishedIn.name: Published in
publishedIn.description: Information about where the resource was published in

name.name: Name
name.description: The name of the journal/book the information was published in

type.name: Type
type.description: Type of resource it was published in (Journal or Book)

identifier.name: Identifier
identifier.description: An identifier for the journal / book

identifierType.name: Identifier type
identifierType.description: The type of identifier used under 'identifier'

volume.name: Volume number
volume.description: The volume number of the journal

issue.name: Issue number
issue.description: The issue number of the journal

pages.name: Pages
pages.description: The pages of the publication which the resource covered

issued.name: Date issued
issued.description: The date on which the resource was issued
issued.datacite_mapping:
Date[dateType=Issued]
PublicationYear (derived For articles and books)

modified.name: Date modified
modified.description: The date on which the resource was last modified

created.name: Date created
created.description: The date on which the resource was created

otherDates.name: Other related dates
otherDates.description: Other important dates related to the resource

type.name: Type of date
type.description: The type of date described by under 'value'

value.name: Date
value.description: A date associated to the resource

contact.name: Contact information
contact.description: Information about contact points for the resource

name.name: Contact name
name.description: The name of the person or organization acting as a contact

details.name: Contact details
details.description: The contact details of the person or organization

detailsType.name: Contact details type
detailsType.description: The type of the contact details

license.name: License information
license.description: Information about the license of the resource

maintenance.name: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Short statement on the Maintenance of the resource
maintenance.example: This dataset is actively updated with new information on a monthly basis

context.name: Context
context.description: The context in which the resource was created (e.g. the name of a resource project)
context.example: This dataset was created in the eartH2Observe project

funding.name: Funding information
funding.description: Information about how the project that created the resource, was funded

organization.name: Funding organization
organization.description: The name of the organization that provided the funding

name.name: Fund name
name.description: The name of the fund used

type.name: Type of identifier
type.description: The type of the identifier given by value

value.name: Identifier
value.description: The actual identifier of the resource

location.name: Location information
location.description: Information about locations described in the resource

name.name: Location name
name.description: The name of the location the resource is about

geometry.name: GeoJSON geometry
geometry.description: A GeoJSON geometry containing the point or bounding box of the location. For a bounding box use the ElasticSearch Envelope type

elevation.name: Elevation
elevation.description: The elevation of the resource w.r.t. MSL (negative for depth)

spatialResolution.name: Spatial resolution
spatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the resource in metres

timePeriod.name: Time information
timePeriod.description: Information about time related to the resource, such as time of collection

start.name: Start date
start.description: Start date of the time period

end.name: End date
end.description: End date of the time period

temporalResolution.name: Temporal resolution
temporalResolution.description: The temporal resolution of the resource in seconds

format.name: Format
format.description: The file format (extention) of the resource

size.name: Resource size
size.description: Total size of files( e.g. in KB/MB/GB, or resource size in pages

delimiter.name: Delimiter
delimiter.description: The delimiter in case of csv or other seperated files

fingerprint.name: Fingerprint/hash information
fingerprint.description: Information to determine correctness of downloaded file

type.name: Fingerprint type
type.description: The type of fingerprint given under 'value'

value.name: Fingerprint
value.description: The fingerprint of the resource (typically hash such as MD5, SHA256â€¦)

sampleSize.name: Sample size
sampleSize.description: The sample size of the resource

coordinateSystem.name: Coordinate system
coordinateSystem.description: Contains a reference to the coordinate system of the resource

programLanguage.name: Programming language
programLanguage.description: Specifies the programming language of software

software.name: Software
software.description: Software used/necessary to create/use the data

platform.name: Hard & software platform
platform.description: The platform (e.g. OS and version, system architecture etc.) required for software/code to run.

device.name: Collection device
device.description: The sensor, sensor type, or platform used to collect the data (e.g. Microscope, satellite, Sentinel-1)

quality.name: Quality statement
quality.description: A short statement on the data quality of the resource
quality.example: The measurements in the month November were affected by a severe storm. For all other measurments, errors are below 15 cm

lineage.name: Lineage description
lineage.description: The processing steps and edits that were undertaken to create the dataset
lineage.example: The LANDSAT images were classified using 6-classes, to generate the land use maps

contribution.name: List of contributions
contribution.description: List of all contributions to the metadata entry

name.name: Contributor name
name.description: The name of the person that created/edited the metadata entry, or the name of the organization/portal from which the entry was retrieved.

identifier.name: Contributor identifier
identifier.description: An identifier for the contributor or organization/portal in the format described by 'identifierScheme'

date.name: Date of contribution
date.description: The date on which the contribution was made

version.name: Version of the metadata
version.description: The metadata version which was created by the contributor

description.name: Untranslated Abstract/Description
description.description: Untranslated abstract (if the resource is a document) else a untranslated description of the resource
description.example: Om in beeld te krijgen hoe het staat met de digitale dienstverlening, heeft Deloitte voor het tweede jaar op rij de digitale volwassenheid van de meest gebruikte producten voor burgers en bedrijven bij de medeoverheden onderzocht. Daarbij is per organisatie en per overheidsproduct vastgelegd op welke manier het product digitaal aangeboden wordt.

subject.name: Untranslated subject
subject.description: Untranslated subject in the original metadata

externalReference.name: External reference information
externalReference.description: Information about the reference to the external metadata platform

type.name: Reference type
type.description: The type of external reference (preferred: Only one reference)

URL.name: Reference URL
URL.description: The URL of the external reference

registrationRequired.name: Registration required
registrationRequired.description: Indicates whether registration is required to access the data

name.name: Relation name
name.description: The name of the relation (only for non-DataClopedia references)

type.name: Relation type
type.dc_mapping:
relation
isVersionOf
isReplacedBy
replaces
isRequiredBy
requires
isPartOf
IsReferencedBy
references
isFormatOf
conformsTo

identifier.name: Relation identifier
identifier.description: The identifier of the relation (preferably on DataClopedia)

_availableOnline.name: Available online
_availableOnline.description: Does the resource discription contain links to online resources

id.name: Resource identifier
id.description: The external platform unique identifier, with the id of the platform in front of it..

_dplatform_uid.name: External Platform Unique Identifier
_dplatform_uid.description: The Unique identifier of the resource in the external platform
